feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.11.09
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 13e48dded208f76738df83e85ecb4af29e64d0df feature: Better guest handling (#472)

Others

  • 344df3739dc0d3ab9c4c4f9c3adf571fe4ac68a3 build(deps): bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.0 to 4.5.1 (#473)
  • 0d981773b3ecef4bcacafb8b24d51424ea01001f fmt: gofmt

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.11.09

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.11.09

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.11.24
entry.content:
Changelog

Security

  • 79a411935183f479c3ef68ab74459f216761def7 security: Update cross-spawn vulnerable dependency (#482)

Features

  • f0b1cefb720077a50081dbed77886c0314c70816 feature: OAuth2 early support for CertBundles (#474) and Usergroups (#477) (#485)

Bug fixes

  • b4a555e3da5a3751eb7cd2bbd3ce21abd65df9ac bugfix: #481 StartActionAndWait now allows arguments. (#483)

Others

  • 851d0dac848ab775d60e9db5996725e57e55889c doc: Fix #478 - easy.cfg typo [skip ci]

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.11.24

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.11.24

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.2.19
entry.content:
Changelog

Security

  • 10a473ca1cdc3b45120899ed19534f7a8c591e23 security: Big dependency update
  • c7207d1ee6c4c20f3ed173955931342a0f4966d0 security: Big dependency update

Features

  • 2fc7c23416e0db3f5101fa2f235e6fefcd068251 feature!: Trigger changed Triggers, allowing multiple actions (#515)
  • 12f87ca6e12a3f9a220cf165c6ce93be9a629ae8 feature: Add support for raw textboxes #490
  • 39368d511a2535c19867fd8f528f5380a5392f22 feature: Limit log history to prevent browser lag and grpc encode failures (#507)

Bug fixes

  • 2cf538bab1a8bc2385fd94baaed4d202e8680fff bugfix: Systemd unit now waits for network and filesystem #495 (#514)

Others

  • f0d70f0c150777e2f24b3d8ef453194699430307 Migrate dashboard-icons to homarr-labs
  • c04203e6717c6569210895b7a8a49f28a394dfb1 Update README.md (#508)
  • bf9370778742ff8be4fe9f76b2d58083cfe62b92 build(deps): bump github.com/MicahParks/jwkset from 0.5.17 to 0.7.0 (#506)
  • 906b6c5783851859236fc9185c748f3e6201b689 build(deps): bump serialize-javascript and mocha in /integration-tests (#513)
  • 7ddc112b2c216df8e67ab1e9f4c7145d29b0e55c doc: CONTRIBUTING - add more guidelines
  • 6550223ee49d02d48c5e2f2c361e476a508d4c31 fmt: code style (#518)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.2.19

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.2.19

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!
